== How to build MPlayerX==
  
  #. svn checkout *{{{http://mplayerx.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mplayerx-read-only}}}*
  #. go to Universal Detector/
   *. open the UniversalDetector.xcodeproj
   *. change the current build configuration to *Release*, *NOT Debug* (since MPlayerX will copy the binaries from the release folder)
  #. go to MPlayerX/, open MPlayerX.xcodeproj and build
